overview: At the age of 20 I became a war reporter, self-exiled in the no-manâ€™s land between Lebanon and Israel. There, I discovered a generation of young Middle Easterners who found refuge in rave parties. They were fleeing the trauma of war. I was running from something else. Through transcendence and the feeling of being alive, our therapy was collective.
tagline: The stakes of this project : the film of my life - no filters.
title: Trance Therapy
